title: Stylishly updated Grapevine home with large fenced backyard
posting_body: Inside this newly renovated 3 bed, 2 bath Grapevine home for a fantastic open-concept floor plan, hardwood floors, recessed lighting, fully upgraded bathrooms, and a fresh coat of paint throughout.
This space is modern and chic, thanks to high vaulted ceilings, updated light fixtures, and lots of natural light.
The new kitchen boasts granite counters, stainless steel appliances, and crisp white cabinetry that's sure to elevate weekend brunches and late-night snacks.
A door right off the kitchen leads out to the spacious and fenced backyard for easy entertaining.
This great home also features air conditioning, an in-unit washer/dryer, and parking.
From here, all of Grapevine and is within an easy drive!
You'll be minutes from Main Street Grapevine, Grapevine Lake, and lots of parks, including Bicentennial Park, Oak Grove Park, and Dove Park.
Trader Joe's, Costco, Target, Southlake Town Square, ALDI, and more are all within a short drive.
Downtown Dallas is only 25 miles away via TX-114.
This quiet, residential street isn't far from some excellent dining options, too!
Whistle Britches, Mason & Dixie, Wildwood Smoke Craft Whiskey, and Dragon House are within 1.5 miles of home.
